text:
Created attachment 33655
Fixes for quality defects

With the use of Coverity Static Analysis technologies, some quality defects were identified such as potential null pointer dereferences and resource leaks. The attached patch provides fixes to these issues.
creator: sean.boyd@synopsys.com

text: Coverity Static Analysis has a bad habit of generating a high proportion of false positive results. You'll need to demonstrate that each of these issues is valid - ideally with a test case - before any fixes are considered.
creator: markt@apache.org
